Third Party Fonts
-----------------

All the fonts in this directory are covered under the Open Font License.
Information on the license can be found at:

http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&id=OFL

or in text file OFL.txt in this directory.

Specific sources:

OldStandard - http://www.thessalonica.org.ru/en/fonts-download.html
Theano      - http://www.thessalonica.org.ru/en/fonts-download.html
Andika      - http://www.sil.org/computing/catalog/show_software.asp?id=119
Breip       - http://helloalan.com/projects/breip/
Nanum       - http://hangeul.naver.com/download.nhn
